channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Execs remain positive on long-term prospects amid VC funding downturn
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Outlier Ventures exec Gvantsa Chkuaseli said there are reasons to stay optimistic, and challenging conditions haven’t stamped out interest.

item.title: Binance to deactivate some deposit addresses for wallet upgrade
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Cryptocurrency exchange Binance continues upgrading its wallet infrastructure, which requires affected users to get new wallet addresses.

item.title: Bitcoin hits new yearly highs as BTC price rebounds to $31.5K
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin bulls are stampeding past the top of the range, but there is already a risk that BTC price is forming a "predatory range."

item.title: UAE emerges as a pro-Bitcoin mining destination in the Middle East
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The United Arab Emirates’ combined Bitcoin mining capacity is estimated to be around 400 megawatts or 4% of Bitcon’s global hash rate.

item.title: OpenAI creates a new team to tackle ‘superintelligent’ AI systems
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: OpenAI says it’s planning to create a team to help manage the risks that could come from a superintelligent AI system that it expects to arrive within the decade.

item.title: Top 5 dog-themed cryptocurrencies by market cap
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Liza Savenko
item.description: Explore the top dog-inspired cryptocurrencies and the hidden potential behind cute memes.

item.title: Bill to exempt foreigners from crypto taxes passes preliminary reading in Israel
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: The bill would also level up crypto bonuses with employee stock options by reducing the current 50% tax to 25%.

item.title: Bitcoin bull run incoming: Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao reveals when
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao delivered his forecast for the next Bitcoin bull run during a Twitter Space on July 5.

item.title: Binance, Coinbase and Gemini staff are among the least happy, data suggests
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: Crypto exchange Binance said its “hardcore” work culture could explain some of the results, while recruiters warn the data should be taken with a grain of salt.

item.title: Crypto’s Indiana Jones? Coinbase exec helps recover $322K of once-lost crypto
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Conor Grogan tracked down $322,000 of dormant Ethereum Classic and returned it to its owner, who was unaware the money ever existed.

item.title: Pentagon is testing whether AI can plan response to an all-out war
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Air Force Colonel Matthew Strohmeyer said the initial tests were “highly successful” but admitted it isn’t “ready for primetime right now.“

item.title: Bitcoin miners raked $184M in fees in Q2, surpassing all of 2022
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: It’s been one of the most lucrative quarters for those that profit from Bitcoin transaction fees in nearly two years.

item.title: CFTC investigators conclude ex-Celsius CEO Mashinsky broke US rules: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: If a majority of CFTC commissioners agree with the conclusion, the regulator could file a case in federal court.

item.title: On-chain derivatives are DeFi’s next boom opportunity — Apollo Crypto
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: With centralized exchanges coming under increasing scrutiny, Henrik Andersson has touted the promise of decentralized derivatives.

item.title: Super Mario: Crypto Thief, Sega blockchain game, AI games rights fight — Web3 Gamer
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Callan Quinn
item.description: AI-assisted game development leads to fights over rights, Sega and Ubisoft‘s first blockchain games, and Super Mario: Crypto Thief.

item.title: Searches for ‘AI jobs’ in 2023 are 4x higher than ‘crypto jobs’ when BTC hit $69K
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: Web3’s entry into the public perception coupled with peak BTC value led to the highest number of searches for “crypto jobs” ever in 2022. Now, “AI jobs” has hit its own peak.

item.title: dYdX exchange launches testnet for ‘fully decentralized’ version 4
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The crypto exchange launched a testnet featuring an on-chain order book and matching engine, doing away with the centralized components found on the mainnet version.

item.title: Binance.US market share drops below 1% amid regulatory lawsuit: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The U.S. market share of Binance.US has reportedly dropped amid a Securities and Exchange Commission lawsuit, while Coinbase’s rose roughly 7% in June.

item.title: Twitter receives money transmitter licenses in three US states
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: Michigan, Missouri and New Hampshire have granted money transmitter licenses to Twitter Payments LLC, leaving 47 U.S. states yet to weigh in.

item.title: ‘Bitcoin is an international asset' — BlackRock CEO’s bullish remarks
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The CEO of the world’s largest asset management firm, Larry Fink, spoke on BlackRock's spot Bitcoin ETF filing and the potential benefits of crypto.

item.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Serge Egon Ostman
item.category: why did the Fed pause rates
item.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

item.title: IMF eyes tens of billions in crypto asset taxes, has few suggestions for collecting them
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Income tax, property tax, VAT, corrective taxation — there is a tax goldmine out there for governments, but they will have to think hard about accessing it.

item.title: Price analysis 7/5: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, DOGE, SOL, LTC, MATIC, DOT
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bullish crypto traders are struggling to clear the overhead barrier in Bitcoin and select altcoins, indicating that bears have not given up yet.

item.title: CEX crypto trading hits $2.7T in June amid SEC lawsuits, BlackRock Bitcoin ETF filing
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: The first increase in trading volume in months was driven by market volatility following the SEC’s lawsuits against Binance and Coinbase, as well as improving sentiment via BlackRock's ETF filing.

item.title: Half of stolen NFTs are sold within 3 hours: Nifty Newsletter, June 28–July 4
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Swiss bank Credit Suisse has partnered with the Swiss Football Association to release NFTs in support of women’s soccer in the country.

item.title: Crypto user moves $160M in Bitcoin from Luna Foundation Guard wallet: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Blockchain data showed the wallet reportedly associated with LFG had a balance of roughly 6,983 BTC in October 2022, with transactions later moving funds to different addresses.

item.title: HSBC trialing quantum-safe financial transaction network in the UK
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: The venerable British bank became the first to join BT (formerly British Telecom) and Toshiba’s secure quantum “metro” network in the United Kingdom.

item.title: BitgetX joins HKVAC as it aims for exchange license in Hong Kong
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The Hong Kong Virtual Asset Consortium was established on May 31 to create indexes and rating services for cryptocurrencies.

item.title: Why is Litecoin’s price down today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.category: why is Litecoin price down today
item.description: Litecoin’s price is down today in part due to its overbought conditions and the upcoming release of the Federal Reserve’s meeting minutes.

item.title: EU blockchain sandbox unveils first 20 use cases after wave of applications
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: According to the European Commission, 20 projects have been selected in the first cohort to receive legal advice and regulatory guidance.
